name: brain-eating-machines
description: FIRST LEGO League robotics and STEM education website

scripts.build:js: for f in assets/js/*.js; do [ "${f%.min.js}" = "$f" ] && npx terser "$f" -o "${f%.js}.min.js" -c -m; done
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.serve: npm run build:css && bundle exec jekyll serve

author: Brain Eating Machines
